title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen. Large oval, gadrooned frame containing large blue flower, grapes, red flower and pear, yellow pear and grapes with tan leaves. Hanging by lavender ribbon over fram is heavy swag ofyellow and blue flowers, red melon ?, grapes and lavender flowers. Oval frames and swags in rows, 1/2 drop repeat. In between are large twisting columns with tan cherubs standing on them. Condition: Soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-43.
